tool_description: Maps activities to specific learning objectives and educational outcomes, identifying which skills and knowledge areas each activity develops.

activity_ids.description: List of activity IDs to analyze for learning objectives

target_skills.description: Specific skills to focus on: problem-solving, creativity, communication, motor skills, etc.

learning_framework.description: Educational framework to use: developmental, montessori, waldorf, reggio, or standard

error_messages: Empty activity list: At least one activity ID must be provided.
Invalid learning framework: Must be one of [developmental, montessori, waldorf, reggio, standard].
Activity not found: One or more activity IDs are not recognized.
Invalid skill specification: Target skills must be from recognized skill categories.
usage: Provide activity IDs to map their learning objectives. Optionally specify target skills and educational framework for customized analysis.

activity_objectives.description: Learning objectives for each activity in order of activity IDs

skill_development.description: Primary skills developed by each activity

learning_domains.description: Educational domains addressed by each activity

assessment_suggestions.description: Ways to assess learning progress for each activity
